resources.string: Uzuza ahateganyijwe muri iyi nyandiko shingiro cg ngenderwaho
Uzuza ahateganyijwe muri iyi nyandiko shingiro cg ngenderwaho.

Siba inyandiko shingiro cg ngenderwaho wa bitse.
\'Byahinduwe kuri\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy\'kuri\' HH: mm
Inyandiko shingiro cg ngenderwaho itagaragara cg ihishe.
Urutonde rwamazina, uva kuri A ujya kuri Z
Urutonde rwamazina, uva kuri Z ujya kuri A
Ntakintu byerekana./n/n gerageza gushaka kandi wuzuzuze form iriho ubusa.
Ntakibashije kugaragara.\n\n gerageza wohereze form zarangiye mbere yuko zisuzumwa.
Ntakintu byerekana./n/n gerageza gushaka kandi wuzuzuze form iriho ubusa.
Igikorwa mugerageza gutangira kirasaba uruhushya, kandi ntirwatanzwe
Udafite ubwo burenganzira Collect ntabwo ishobora kwemera form cg ibike amakuru. Ongera ufungure iyo application mugihe ufite ubwo burenganzira
Udafite ubwo burenganzira, Collect ntiyarikodinga location yawe. Mwongere igihe muzaba mubasha gutanga ubwo burenganzira
Utatanze uruhushya porogaramu ntibasha gukoresha Camera bityo ongera kugerageza nyuma yuko uhaye uruhushya porogaramu
Udafite uburenganzira Collect ntishobora kwemera konte. Mwakongera igihe mwaba mubonye ubwo burenganzira.
Udafite uburenganzira Collect ntishobora kwemera konte. Wongere igihe uzaba wahawe ubwo burenganzira
ODK Collect ntabwo ihamagara ariko icyenera kugira uburenganzira kuri bimwe ku gikoresho nka nimero ya telefone, n\'ibiranga icyo gikoresho
Kugenzura byarangiye. Ibyo mwatanze byose byabitswe.
Ingorane z\'ikosa kuri fomu %1$s : %2$s ni ibitabonetse cyangwa bituzuye
Ihangane, ntibikunze kugenzura amakuru ari mu ifishi
Habayeho ikibazo ubwo wuzuzaga form. Mwongere mugerageze.
Ntibikunze guhindura ifishi bitewe nuko ifishi ya mbere yasibwe. \'%1$s\'
Iyi form ntabwo ushobora kugira icyo uhindura mugihe byerekanyeko yarangiye. Ishobora kuba yerekana amakuru mu buryo butagaragara.
Siba itsinda ryose ndetse n\'udutsinda duto turibarizwamo \'%s\'
Iyi fishi iremereye tabuleti yawe, gerageza kugira ibyo ugabanyamo.
Porogaramu yahuye n\'ikibazo cyo kutagaragaza amakuru.
Izina wemeje ntirigomba kuba ririho ubusa!
Kuri ubu ntabwo ari icy\'ibitsemo kimwe!
Nta fomu itujujwe ihura n\'iyi jr_form_id.
Aya makuru ntashoboye gushyirwa mu ifishi ariko ushobora kuyasanga 1%1$s
Gufata amajwi byahagaritse. biraza gukunda muri 1%s
Imashini icapa wahisemo ntiwemerewe kuyikoresha aka kanya. yinsitare ubone kuyikoresha
Mugihe hari ibitagenze neza. Ibyagaragajwe kuri OSM ntibihabwa agaciro.
Ibyo wagaragaje muri ubu buryo ntagaciro byahawe!
Ifoto wahisemo mububiko si ifoto yukuri
Ifoto y\'imbere ntabwo iboneka kuri iki gikoresho
Iyi Tablet ntabwo yemera Camera2 API
Ubu buryo bubika amajwi kuri iyi gahunda. Ugomba gufungura insakazamajwi yawe, iyo utabikoze iyi gahunda ntifunguka.
Ubu buryo busaba kubika amajwi kuri iyi gahunda. Kutayikoresha bihagarika kubika amajwi kandi bigahanagura n\'ayarariho. Urashaka gukomeza?
Iyandikwa ntiriratangira ako kanya. Banza wongere ufungure aho kwandika.
Ntabwo ushobora kwongera kubona iyi dokima mugihe waba uyisibye. Wizeye nezako wifuzaga kuyisiba?
Banza uhagarike gufata amajwi mbere yo kuva kuri ino paji
Hagaragaye ikibazo mu gihe hageragezwaga guhuza amakuru 1%s
Amakuru agaragara mu buryo buhagaze arahura neza 1%s
Akadirishya uhitamo gakoreshwamo imibare gusa. Iyo wibeshye aba ari \'%s\'
Ikosa ryagaragaye mumikorere yishakisha(): Imikorere isaba ubusobanuro kuri 1, 4 cyangwa 6.
Ikosa ryagaragaye mumikorere yishakisha(): Imikorere ntizwi \'%s\'.
Ikosa ryagaragaye mumikorere yishakisha(): \'%s\' Ntabwo yahawe agaciro nk\'imikorere.
Amakuru ari gutunganywa \'1%1$s\', ba wihanganye gato \'2%2$s\'
Amakuru mwashakaga kuri 1%1$s ntabwo yabashije kuboneka. Birashoboka ko mwibagiwe gushyiramo 2%2$s.csv file muri form yawe?
Ikosa ryagaragaye mu rutonde rwimikorere mwishakisha():%s
Uretse gusa ubusesenguzi bugaragazwa n\'iyi nzira ya X: \"%s\"
Ingano ntabwo yakiriwe: haraburamo igipimo cy\'ubwiyongere n\'igipimo cya rukuruzi cyangwa byombi.
Impamvu zatumye uhindura amakuru wari winjije
Ugomba kwandi impamvu uhinduye amakuru wari watanze
Mwihangane.%s y\'ikarita yibanze ntabashije kuboneka muri telefone yawe.Twagusaba guhitamo indi mu igenamitere rusange yawe>ikarita
Ntibishoka ko ukoresha ikarita iranga ahantu.Reba ko waba ufite google play muri telefone yawe
Nta bubiko shingiro buhari bugaragaza %1$s mu gihe hari amakuru fatizo ashingiye kuri %2$s
Haruguru aha habanje ububiko bwose bugaragaza %1$s mu gihe hari amakuru fatizo ashingiye kuri %2$s
Kora igenzura cyangwa uhindure ujye ahandi
Ihangane, ibituma amakuru y\'ahantu afatwa birafunze
Iyi form irashaka kugenzura aho uherereye, ariko Google Play Services ntabwo iboneka
Iyi nyandiko shingiro irashaka kugenzura aho uherereye, ariko banyirigikorwa baho ntabwo bemejwe. Usabwa kwemeza igenamiterere ya Android.
Iyi form ishaka kwerekana aho uherereye ariko ntiwabifunguye. Yishyireho 1%1$s murutonde ruri hejuru.
Iyi form iri kwerekana aho uherereye.Ushobobora kubihagarika muri 1%1$s unyuze ku rutonde ruri hejuru aha
Tangira cg Shakisha ibimenyetso biranga ahantu.
GPS irafunze kuri tabuleti yawe. urifuza kuyifungura?
Siba ibyari byamaze guhindurwa ubundi usubire kuri porogaramu ya ODK
Bigomba kuba bifite byibuze ibintu 3 kugirango bikore Polygon
Bigomba kugira ibintu byibuze 2 kugirango bikore Polyline
Ubryo bw\'umwihariko mu kubika neza ibyafashwe.
Ikimenyetso ndangahantu kinjiye: %d (kanda mumwanya w\'ikimenyetso ndangahantu)
Ikimenyetso ndangahantu kinjiye: %1$d (andika buri segonda ibi %2$d)
Ikimenyetso ndangahantu kinjiye: %1$d (andika buri munota ibi %2$d)
Ikimenyetso ndangahantu kinjiye: %1$d (andika buri segonda %2$d, kundengo ya %3$d m)
Ikimenyetso ndangahantu kinjiye: %1$d (andika buri munota %2$d, kundengo ya %3$d m)
Kanda umare umwanya kugirango ushyiremo mark cg ukore kuri buto ya marker
Izina cyangwa se ijambo banga sibyo 1%s
Erekana Form zagiye na form zitagiye
Mugukurura amajwi ntaboneke mu bubiko, ntabwo abarimo ku: %1$s
Ohereza ibyagaragajwe bitaremezwa, hita wongera ugerageze.
ODK ihita yohereza ibitemejwe, izere neza niba wemeje ibisabwa byose.
Akira %1$s.\n\n y\'inyandiko shingiro %2$s ya %3$s inyandiko shingiro (zose).
Urutonde rw\'ibibazo/form(ariko biteganywa kugenda z\'ihabwa nimero bitewe n\' impinduka ikozwe ho nyuma y\'uko yahawe aba atanga amakuru)
Aya ni amakuru agezweho ku ifishi ufite
Gushyira ku gihe ifishi byagenze neza
Mu gihe ukomeje guhura niki kibazo, baza uwagusabye gutanga aya makuru
Collect ntibasha kugera kuri seriveri kuri %s. Ese winjijemo linki neza
Collect ntibasha guhura na seriveri kuri %s. Ese winjijemo linki neza
Kubika amakuru ari mu ifishi kuri tabuleti ntibyakunze
Ihangane, %1$s muri %2$s z\' Ifishi wahisemo ntizabashije gusibwa.
Ihangane, Igikorwa cyo gusiba ifishi kiracyari gukorwa
Mu ijambobanga ahantu hariho ubusa ntibyemewe
Kuzuza ahantu hariho ubusa ntabwo byemewe mu izina ugomba gukoresha
Inyandiko shingiro igaragaza URL ngenderwaho. Iyo itabikora, iyo URL izakoreshwa.
Koresha uburyo bwo kunyereza ujyana hirya
Inyandiko shingiro yakuwe mububiko nyuma gusa.
Guhita bidawunilodinga versions nshya ya forms
Hisha amakuru ya form imaze igihe kinini
Hazagaragazwa gusa inyandiko shingiro yanyuma itujujwe.
Wifi ndetse na Interineti ya tabuleti
Nyuma yo kohereza form na media kukicaro Ushobora guhita ubisiba.
Garagaza inyandiko shingiro yasojwe itagaragara cg yabuze.
Rangiza kuzuza neza inyandiko shingiro yakuruwe cg yashatswe.
Shyiraho akamenyetso bwangu kunyandiko shingiro kuri urwo rukurikirane mbumbe rw\'amakuru.
Amakuru yo gukoresha atazwi afasha itsinda rya ODK gushyira imbere gukosora
Inyandiko shingiro mbumbe y\'urukurikirane rw\'amakuru yatanzwe.
Inyandiko shingiro mbumbe y\'urukurikirane rw\'amakuru yatanzwe.
Ako gaciro kose kongerwa ku nyandiko shingiro gafite izina rikoresha, email na/ cg telefone yinjijwe kare igaragaza umuntu wohereje amakuru.
Ijambo ryibanga rya admin ryahinduwe neza
Kutemeza bihisha uhereye k\'urutonde rw\'ibanze cg fatizo.
Kutemeza bihisha uhereye ku igenamitere rusange
Ntuhitemo inyandiko shingiro ihishwe ahubwo uyinjize.
Inyandiko shingiro zabitswe (Urukurikirane rw\'imbumbe z\'inyankiko z\'amakuru, Urukurikirane rw\'amakuru fatizo yibanze)
Inyandiko shingiro zitujujwe (Imbumbe z\'inyankiko shingiro, amakuru fatizo yinyandiko shingiro yibanze kumbumbe zinzweho)
Hisha aho wohereje inyandiko shingiro (Hisha ububiko bw\'izo nyandiko)
Ibyo wahisemo byose biravamo burundu. Nturi bubashe gusubira inyuma

Shyiraho igikoresho gicunga kugira ngo ubuze kwinjira abakoresha nabi igenamitarere?

 Ibyahinduwe ni:
• Kutemeza ibyahindutse ku nyandiko shingiro ibitswe
• Kutemeza ibyinjijwe nyuma
• Garagaza ibyakozwe ku mbogamizi zabaye mwihitamo ryhuse kandi risobanutse.

Mushobora gusura ku igenamiterere kuburyo bukurikira:
• Guhindura inyandiko shingiroibitswe
• Kubika inyandiko shingiro
• Garagaza ibyinjijwe nyma
• Imbogamizi z'ibyakozwe.
Ntabwo ushobora guhamaraga API. Niba ukurikize uko ahantu hateye, usabwa gusubira kumushinga wa readme cg somiwanjye
Wahisemo urupapurombare rwa Google nka musakaza, Hitamo konti ya Google cg email yawe ijyanye n\'igenamiterere rusange, ubone gukomeza
Shakisha ama fomu. Cyangwa uhitemo \'My Drive\' hepfo kugirango ubashe urebe.
Ntibikunda kuyinjiramo.Wareba niba nyiri form yaguhaye uburenganzira bwo kuyinjiramo no kuba haricyo wahindura.
Forms zifungurwa n\'ijambo banga ntago zemewe koherezwa muri Google Sheets
Kugirango wohereza inyandiko shingiro ukoresheje urupapurombara rwa Google ugomba kubanza gushyiramo email yawe muri Musakaza ry\'igenamiterere
Nta tuyira twabonetse mu iyoherezwa ryinyandiko shingiro.
Hejuru y\'imbumbe y\'ububiko bumwe bw\'amajwi bwagaragaye, usabwa gusiba bumwe noneho ugasubiramo.
Abo mukorana baracyakusanyiriza amakuru mu mpapuro? Bahe ODK collect
Tanga igitekerezo cyawe muri play store
Igitekerezo cyawe(twizera cyiza) kiratuma application irushaho kugaragara cyane muri Play Store
ODK ikoreshwa mugukusanya amakuru kubwimibereho myiza mubidukikije bifite ibibazo.
Injira ihuriro kugirango ubone ubufasha, gusaba ibiranga, gutanga umusanzu / ibisobanuro!
Kwemeza umubarendangabanga cg kode ya QR
Kurura umubarendangabanga cg kode ya QR
Umubare wanyuma ntarengwa w’inyuguti wageze: Umubarendangabanga cg kode ya QR ntishobora kubyara igenamiterere ryose.
Ibigizwe n\'amakuru agaragara: Jambobanga rya muyoboyi namusakaza
Kanda wemeze Umubarendangabanga cg kode ya QR iginzwe na jambobanga ryamuyobozi cg musakaza
Ibigizwe n\'amakuru agaragara ya: Jambobanga muyobozi
Ibigizwe n\'amakuru agaragara ya: Jambobanga musakaza
Kode za QR ntabwo zirimo settings zuzuye
Igenamiterere zagize ikibazo. Uhereye ku igenamiterere rya Muyobozi, Hindura cg tangiza igenamiterere cg uzanemo inshya zikora.
Ntabwo bibasha gusibika \' %s \'. Siba iyi form n\'intoki wongere uyi downloadinge.
Wa downloadinze form 2 zitandukanye ariko zihuje amakuru. Birashoboka ko ari zimwe zashyizwemo mubihe bitandukanye cgw ziturutse ahatandukanye. Nimba ariko bimeze, siba imwe.

Iyi fomu yandika amajwi ya mikoro yigikoresho cyawe. \ n
 Ushobora gukoresha igipimo cyerekana amajwi kugirango umenye neza ko mikoro yegeranye bihagije nijwi ukeneye gufata amajwi. n
\ Guhagarika gufata amajwi nyamuneka sohoka muri iyi fomu.n
\ Kubindi bisobanuro nyamuneka hamagara umuntu wagusabye gukusanya amakuru.
Inyandiko shingiro zose, zoherejwe n\'igenamitere sizasibwa burundu.
Ntabwo hoherejwe. Mugusiba umushinga, usabwa kohereza cg ugasiba ibyoherejwe byose.
Ukoresheje amaboko injiza amakuru kuri project
Niba wamaze gushyiramo umushinga wawe, wakongera gutangiza igenamiterere rusange ni rya Muyobozi.
